sentences.english: If it doesn t crunch or crinkle, he wont eat it.
sentences.chinese: 不能發出嘎吱作響或者沙沙聲兒的食物他是不會喫的。

sentences.english: The only thing you could hear was the wind rustling through the grass.
sentences.chinese: 唯一能聽到的是風吹過草原時發出的沙沙聲。

sentences.english: The wind is whispering in the roof.
The breeze murmured in the pines.
The hoot owl continued its call in the distance, and the night breeze rustled the leaves in the trees.
sentences.chinese: 貓頭鷹在遠方繼續叫着，晚風吹得樹葉沙沙作響。

sentences.english: Waves of white sound break along a beach that isn't there.
sentences.chinese: 海灘的畫面一閃即逝，白噪音的沙沙聲代替了一切。

sentences.english: The leaves of the poplar trees rustled in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 風吹着白楊樹葉沙沙地響。

sentences.english: Night wind Department, poplar leaves rustles, they are singing from the songs?
sentences.chinese: 夜風處，白楊樹的葉子沙沙響，它們是在吟唱離歌嗎？

sentences.english: A briny wind blew, rustled the trees.
sentences.chinese: 一股鹹味道的空氣吹來，弄得樹木沙沙作響。

sentences.english: His eyes flicked to a rustle beside him.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛朝着身旁一陣沙沙的響聲溜了過去。

sentences.english: I heard someone rustling the papers in my office.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見有人在我的辦公室裏沙沙地翻動文件。

sentences.english: They rustle to the eddying gust, and to the rabbit's tread.
sentences.chinese: 沙沙作響於狂風的逐旋，兔子的踏踐。

sentences.english: I can hear the whisper of the wind in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我能聽到屋頂上沙沙地響的風聲。

sentences.english: Ariza was all smiles after practice while Vujacic shot on the court.
sentences.chinese: 阿里扎訓練結束後，微笑着看着沙沙在場上練習投籃。

sentences.english: The leaves rustled in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 樹葉在夜風中發出沙沙聲。

definition: (onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 清脆
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
(onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
